mapper.select: SELECT charge_id,YEAR,MONTH,week_of_year, SUM(charge_money) AS charge_money, SUM(charge_money_now) AS charge_money_now, SUM(charge_debt) AS charge_debt, SUM(charge_debt_return) AS charge_debt_return FROM sys_charge_details WHERE 1 = 1 AND status_code != 2 GROUP BY week_of_year ORDER BY `year` DESC,week_of_year DESC LIMIT 0, 12

select charge.charge_id, charge.charge_money, charge.charge_money_now, charge.charge_debt,charge.charge_debt_return,charge.create_time,charge.company_id,charge.status_code ,company.company_name from sys_charge_details as charge left join sys_company as company on charge.company_id=company.company_id where charge.status_code!=2 and charge.charge_id = #{chargeId}
select charge_id from sys_charge_details where status_code!=2 and week_of_year = #{weekOfYear} and year=#{year} and company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_charge_details (charge_money, charge_money_now, charge_debt, charge_debt_return,company_id,create_time,week_of_year,year,month) VALUES (#{chargeMoney},#{chargeMoneyNow},#{chargeDebt},#{chargeDebtReturn},#{companyId},#{createTime},#{weekOfYear},#{year},#{month})
